theme.description: Dynamically apply themes to Thunderbird’s user interface.

theme.comment: This is not in Thunderbird's schema file and needs to be added manually.
theme.description: Properties for a static theme. A static theme must not contain any other WebExtension logic. If additional logic is required, request the <permission>theme</permission> permission and load/update the theme dynamically. More information about themes can be found in the `theme guide <https://developer.thunderbird.net/add-ons/web-extension-themes>`__.

dark_theme.comment: This is not in Thunderbird's schema file and needs to be added manually.
dark_theme.description: Fallback properties for the dark system theme in a static theme.

choices.description: A relative URL for an image bundled with the extension. For example <var>images/background.png</var>. The following image formats are supported: <li>JPEG <li>PNG <li>APNG <li>SVG (animated SVG is supported from Thunderbird 59) <li>GIF (animated GIF isn’t supported)

A data URL using a base64 encoded representation of a PNG or JPG image. For example: <codeblock>data:image/png;base64,iVBORw0KGgoAAAANSUhEUgAAAAUAAAAFCAYAAACNbyblAAAAHElEQVQI12P4//8/w38GIAXDIBKE0DHxgljNBAAO9TXL0Y4OHwAAAABJRU5ErkJggg==</codeblock>
